txt.en:
Amilíbi appears frustrated.

'We hoped the response from Jombahok or Khadûr would be swift. Alas, both captains consolidate their positions rather than risking further hostility. Their inaction creates unease.

'We could ask you to press our enemies harder and push for all-out warfare. Or, we can seek more allies.

'We chose the latter.

'We wonder if you will act as our emissary to the Elves in the south at Shonith. They will no longer speak to us, and we do not know why.

'Their last oasis lies far to the south-west, deep within the crags. Will you seek them out?'

'We know the plight of the men who dwell in the wastes of Khûd Zagin. I cannot pledge to any cause of Man. Not while we struggle to maintain what little we can of the natural world.

'Do you not see the horror growing all around you? Do you not see that this is the last vestige of us in the world?

'No, we struggle to live our own lives. We can spend no effort to aid those men.'
Amalíbi asks you to seek the wisdom and aid of the peculiar Elves living in an oasis in the south of Khûd Zagin. The Elves are secluded and do not often engage with Men.
Amalíbi asks you to make your way south of Ghalbûru to a hidden oasis called Shonith, where Elves live and seclude themselves from the difficulties and trials of Man.
